alert.note: Alert for Carroll; Grenada (Mississippi) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued January 18 at 7:11PM CST until January 18 at 8:15PM CST by NWS Jackson
info.description: The National Weather Service in Jackson has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northwestern Carroll County in north central Mississippi... Grenada County in north central Mississippi... * Until 815 PM CST. * At 711 PM CST, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from near Minter City to near Avalon to near Greenwood, moving northeast at 55 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Grenada, Leflore, Jefferson, Gore Springs, Teoc, Elliott, Avalon, Bew Springs and Holcomb. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 800 PM CST for north central Mississippi. For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
